text: The 2011 Tuscaloosa–Birmingham tornado was a very strong multiple-vortex tornado in Alabama. It took place on April 27, 2011. The tornado was a violent EF4 which caused over $2 billion in damage. Early reports indicated 65 people were killed, with over 1,000 injured. However, this was revised to 64 deaths and more than 1,500 injuries. ==References== ==Other websites== * Interview with Storm Chaser of April 27 Tuscaloosa Tornado Category:2011 disasters Category:2011 in the United States Category:2011 in weather Category:2010s disasters in the United States Category:21st century in Alabama Category:April 2011 events Category:Tornadoes in the United States
title: 2011 Tuscaloosa–Birmingham tornado
